subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Mark Teixeria’s three-run homer in the seventh, his first since May 15, capped a five-run outburst and made a strong start by A. J. Burnett hold up.
snippet: Mark Teixeria’s three-run homer in the seventh, his first since May 15, capped a five-run outburst and made a strong start by A. J. Burnett hold up.
